product.title: Ecowood Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
product.description: Brilliant white fine grain combines a calm and pure white with an intriguing texture which adds depth and subtly to any room in the house. As the light catches your eye you'll see how the textured lines gently ebb and flow to give the piece a unique look and feel. Finding the perfect finishing touch for the spare bedroom can be difficult, so why not go in a different direction? The neutral colouring works in any setting, whilst the natural flow of the lines adds a calming presence that will have your guests drifting off to sleep in no time at all.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Frost Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholmfrost is an attractive, clean and crisp white colour. It will freshen up any space within the home or office. Stockholm frost fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords making them inherently child safe. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee giving extra peace of mind when investing in this product.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Snow White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Stockholm snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind. relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Frost White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Oslo is a beautiful range of blinds with a good selection of colours. The blackout feature makes it perfect for those who want to create darkness in the room at any time. The oslo blackout frost roller blind in a neutral white colour will suit almost any room. relproducts.title: Rimini White - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in white is a soft, fresh shade, perfect for adding light and air to any room it's placed in. Its pale colour and lightweight fabric mean that the room doesn't have to be dark every time you need a little privacy. Brighten up even the gloomiest of rooms by placing this blind in the window; it's ideal for small utility rooms or bathrooms. Alternatively, surround with pretty florals or bold bright shades in the bedroom or living room.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm paper is a light, off white colour. It will brighten up any room wonderfully, there is nothing fresher or more clean looking than white when dressing a window. Their stockholm paper fabric is also moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind ensuring you are purchasing a product that wwill stand the test of time.

relproducts.title: Valencia Simplicity Lilywhite Roller Blind
relproducts.description: When pure and simple is the order of the day, this valencia simplicity lilywhite roller blind is the perfect choice for you, and the perfect dressing for your home. The pure white colouring is simply perfect for blending in effortlessly with more neutral decors as well as add when pure and simple is the order of the day, this valencia simplicity lilywhite roller blind is the perfect choice for you, and the perfect dressing for your home.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Paper White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This soft paper white roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Porcelain White
relproducts.description: Stirloporcelain whiteplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Chic Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Aptly named, the ecowood in chic grey fine grain is as chic as they come. A strong, sophisticated grey is featured on an authentically textured faux wood, formed into wide slats that can be easily adjusted to suit your mood and needs. Grey and yellow is fast becoming a contemporary classic, but have you ever considered going for grey and lime? This funky colour scheme will give a modern kitchen a zesty lift, whilst also maintaining a feeling of stylish chic in your home.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With a timeless look and feel, brilliant white satin from their ever-popular ecowood range offers you a chance to breathe new life into any space. The crisp tone of the white shines through in the background - adding the perfect finishing touch to the contemporary look you've carefully created. We love the idea of pairing brilliant white with crisp white fabrics and light stone grey scatter cushions in the master bedroom.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Pistachio Shell Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: In a gentle, creamy beige, the ecowood in pistachio shell fine grain offers a classic wood texture that adds to its feel of authenticity. The colour is subtle and understated, so it's easily matched, and the wide slats are strong and easy to use. Settle the pistachio shell fine grain against a deep plum purple for a strong and moody bedroom look. Hang the blind on a purple feature wall, painting the others cream or the palest of biscuits, and match bedding and accessories to the plum shade.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Washed White Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A subtly layered finish creates the standout look that we call washed white satin. The washed out white provides the ideal canvas for the gentle ebb and flow of the grain that comes through the closer you look. For a relaxing ambience that will have you drifting off to sleep in no time at all why not pair washed white with some gentle blue walls and a lightly coloured wooden floor? Ideal for taking you back to memories of the coast as you fall into the deepest sleep the moment your head hits the pillow.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Blizzard Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A soft and wintery shade, as its name suggests, the ecowood in blizzard grey satin is nothing if not cool, calm, and collected. Its subtle and unassuming tone means it's completely versatile and will work anywhere in the home amidst any dcor scheme. Try the blizzard grey satin in an all-white dining room, using this soft grey as the only colour in the form of furniture, accessories, and of course, the blind.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With realistic woodgrain texturing for an authentic feel, the ecowood in absolute white fine grain displays an icy white tone and a matt finish. Alongside thick, sturdy slats, this blind features a matching headrail, pelmet, and bottom rail for a classy, finished look. For a bright and breezy bathroom look, where the water-resistant absolute white fine grain will settle in perfectly, post the blind against clean aqua walls.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Devon Cream Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in devon cream fine grain displays a chalky cream finish, with grain detailing, on wide faux wood slats, complete with a matching pelmet, rails, and control cords. Made from hardwearing materials, and treated for water-resistance, this is a quality blind that will last year upon year. Pair the devon cream fine grain with slate greys for a cool and modern aesthetic. Add furniture in light or painted woods and accent with a hint of pale pink or baby blue to give the look a jot of colourful character.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Penthouse Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in penthouse fine grain offers a luxury, hushed cream tone that wouldn't look out of place in the chicest of homes. A textured surface gives the impression of a true wood grain, and this faux wood offers all the strength and durability of wood as well. Settle the penthouse fine grain amongst rich chocolate browns and muted golds for a feeling of opulent luxury in the master bedroom. Include plush rugs and silky-feel bedlinen, opting for a dark feature wall for a striking focal point.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Castle Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: A regal grey, as its name suggests, the ecowood in castle grey fine grain has a beautifully textured finish and the cool grey is clean and understated. Its wide slats are easily adjustable for versatility of light, air, and privacy, making it an ideal all-rounder. Enhance a stark white wall in a living room or dining room by adding the castle grey fine grain, along with other accessories in varying shades of grey.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Vanilla Kiss Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The smooth and silky finish of the ecowood in vanilla kiss satin makes for a lush and refreshing look. The delicate colour plus the durable functionality makes a winning combination, blending style and durability with ease which is what every modern home needs. Insert the vanilla kiss satin into a bright and breezy french-style kitchen, surrounding it with similar vanilla creams, soft whites, and palest pastels.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Vanilla Kiss Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood in vanilla kiss fine grain has all the charm of a painted blind, combined with the authentic feel of a real wood blind. Made from a realistic faux wood, this is a durable and hardwearing piece that will stand the test of time and the moistness of your bathroom. Use the vanilla kiss fine grain in the bathroom or kitchen along with an understated wood and cream colour scheme. Go for wood paneling or units, along with matching cream walls and accessories.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Silky smooth, as its name suggests, the ecowood in absolute white satin has a beautifully untextured finish and the icy white is clean and refreshing. Wide slats form the main structure of this blind, easily adjustable for light, air, and privacy versatility. Enhance the pure, fresh white of the absolute white satin and pit it against an equally clean-toned mint green for a calming yet energising ambience in the kitchen.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Brilliant White Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: When you want to discover a timeless look that will add a contemporary finishing touch to any room in your home, brilliant white satin deluxe is the perfect choice for you. Sleek, crisp, and simple; every inch is carefully crafted to enable you to sit back and relax like never before. Transform the living room into the relaxing space you never want to leave by combining brilliant white with charcoal fabrics and a laminate wooden floor.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Absolute White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: With a chic, designer aesthetic, the ecowood deluxe's absolute white fine grain displays a snow-toned, grain-textured faux wood, formed skilfully into wide, adjustable slats. Coordinating fittings feature alongside, including woven linen ladder ribbons for ultimate vogue. Craft a warm and welcoming atmosphere in the guest bedroom, placing the absolute white fine grain amidst warm peach walls and matching white furnishings.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Brilliant White Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: When you trace your eye across brilliant white fine grain deluxe you come to see how the lines gently wind their way across the surface. When you combine this with the purity of the white, you have the perfect way to add a sense of calm and balance to any room you choose. Matching is all about adding colour contrasts that bring both sides of the equation to life. Light wooden floors and dark charcoal fabrics would be inspired choices in the living room.

relproducts.title: Origin Basic White - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The origin in basic white is made from heavy gauge aluminium guaranteed not to sag. Its wipe-clean practicality combined with the pure white, satin look finish make this blind an attractive option that is pleasing in both looks and functionality. If it's a fresh, clean style that you're looking for, blend the basic white with an all-white colour palette that's perfect for the bathroom or kitchen.

relproducts.description: Their turin range consists of the most popular venetian blind colours.
